title: LÖVEBrew Bundler Game Bundle Configuration
description: Schema for bundle.toml, the configuration file used by the bundler from the LÖVEBrew organization.

metadata.description: The metadata information of a game.

title.description: The display title of the game.

author.description: Name of the game developer or team.

icon.description: Path in the bundle to the icon to use.

targets.description: List of platforms to compile for.

source.description: Path of the folder containing game files.
